en.home.title: Why Garage VanCuba?
en.home.description: I offer the best service and guarantee the best I'll take care of your car like it's mine. My customers' cars comes first.
en.car.title: Car repair and diagnostic
en.chiptuning.title: Chiptuning
en.welding.title: Welding
en.about.petrolhead.title: PETROLHEAD
en.about.petrolhead.text: I'm Jakub and I'm crazy about cars. I can talk about them day and night. I started working on cars from an early age. I have already 10 years of experience as a car mechanic and welder. I have my own car repair shop in Ingelmunster. I work as self-employed person.
en.about.s4.title: MY PROJECT S4
en.about.s4.text: That is the apple of my eye. I have rebuilt everything in this car, from custom interior to the heart, it is a 2.7 biturbo which after my modifications generates 500 horses and 640nm.
